document.full_text: russia and the united states must work hard to bridge major differences over the divisive issue of a european anti-missile shield, russian news agencies quoted the nation's top general as saying on friday.
document.title: russia says breakthrough needed on u.s. missiles
lines_and_colors: russia and the united states must work hard to bridge major differences over the divisive issue of a european anti-missile shield, russian news agencies quoted the nation's top general as saying on friday.
